Literature.Title: Culture-independent discovery of the malacidins as calcium-dependent antibiotics with activity against multidrug-resistant Gram-positive pathogens.
Literature.Author: Hover BM, Kim SH, Katz M, Charlop-Powers Z, Owen J, Ternei MA, Maniko J, Estrela AB, Molina H, Park S, Perlin DS, Brady SF

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Acinetobacter baumannii ATCC 17978(MIC=>100µg/ml),Candida albicans ATCC 1884(MIC=>100µg/ml),Cryptococcus neoformans ATCC 32045(MIC=>100µg/ml),Enterococcus faecium Com15(MIC=0.8-2.0µg/ml),Escherichia coli DH5alpha(MIC=>100µg/ml),Klebsiella pneumoniae ATCC 10031(MIC=>100µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa PAO1(MIC=>100µg/ml),Salmonella enterica serovar Typhimurium IR715(MIC=>100µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus USA 300(MIC=0.4-0.8µg/ml)
